name: Rainy Day (Kirsty Adair)
description:
Rainy Day is a small project based around behaviour trees and inspired by the NPC cars in L.A. Noire.  Each car uses behaviour trees to avoid one another, overtake, and respond to the police siren, all in the setting of a peaceful rainy day.

Press "S" to activate the police car siren.  

Trees/rock/shrubs modelled by Broken Vector
Cars/lampposts modelled by Josh Lee
Road modelled by Subink
